timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Chelic Synergy
description: Shared tank cleave that applies a bleed.

timeline.name: Aetheric Polyominoid #1
description: Summons + AoEs on two tiles, blowing up all tiles in line with their cardinals.
Also marks two healers with stack markers, so split into light parties and separate the stacks.

As the stack resolves, the boss will use Exocleaver, causing six evenly spaced cone AoEs go off, then six more in the first set's safe spots. Wait for the first AoEs to resolve before moving into them.

timeline.name: Pathogenic Cells
description: Players will be marked with numbers 1 through 8, indicating the attack order of the boss. Boss cleaves each party member sequentially while applying a vulnerability debuff.
Resolve by having 1-4 stand in cardinal markers slightly positioned N/S, with 5-8 standing either E/W. After 1 gets hit, swap with 5, 2 swap with 6, etc.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Exchange of Agonies + Choros Ixou
description: Players will be marked with a stack marker, donut AoE or a prey marker. All but two players will be tethered in pairs, indicating that they're going to swap their markers with their partner.
This mechanic is resolved by having prey marker or tethered stack/donut players standing in assigned corners and stack/donut players or tethered prey marker players standing in the middle.
An easy solution is knowing that All DPS will go either in or out, while Tanks and Healers do the opposite. Calling "DPS in" or "DPS out" trivializes the mechanic.
While this happens, the boss will cast Choros Ixou, where she faces her arms North/South or East/West, cleaving those directions of the arena before cleaving the opposite.

timeline.name: Synergy
description: Large AoE tankbuster on both tanks that also inflicts bleed.
Also inflicts a vulnerability debuff on the main tank, requiring a tank swap.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Transmission + Choros Ixou
description: Players will receive either a Chelomorph (wing) or Glassomorph (snake) debuff. On expiry, players get stunned, and Chelomorph players cleave behind them while Glassomorph players cleave in front.
The boss will also be casting Choros Ixou, with the debuff expiring at the same time as the first cleave.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Polyominoid Sigma #1
description: Spawns two pairs of X and + ground AoEs that are tethered to each other, indicating a swap. There will be one safe square, at the corner of the X with an angled tether.
Dark Dome is an invisible AoE bait that snapshots when the cast bar finishes. Bait these AoEs in the middle of the arena before walking over to the safe square.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Exchange of Agonies + Exocleaver
description: Two pairs of tethered stack/prey markers will appear on players. This is another DPS and Tank/Healer split, so have all DPS go south of the boss and all Tanks/Healers go north.
Players with stack markers go away from their groups, while prey markers go inside the boss' hitbox without overlapping the other group.
The first cleaves from Exocleaver resolve at the same time as the stack, so be prepared to move for the second set of cleaves.

timeline.name: Synergy
description: Large AoE tankbuster on both tanks that also inflicts bleed.
Also inflicts a vulnerability debuff on the main tank, requiring a tank swap.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Polyominoid Sigma #2
description: Similar to the first Aetherial Exchange + Polyominoid Sigma, but with healer light party stacks. The safe spot will be the square corner-adjacent to the corner where the two tethered AoEs meet.
Both stacks can fit in the same square as long as they're in opposite corners.

timeline.name: Dark Ashes + Choros Ixou
description: Each player will get a spread marker. Position with melees at inner corners and ranged at outer corners.
The first set of cleaves from Choros Ixou resolve at the same time as the spreads, so avoid the first cleave and prepare to move into the safe spot.

timeline.name: Cachexia #1
description: die here

timeline.name: Chelic Synergy
description: Shared tank cleave that applies a bleed.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Aetheric Polyominoid #2
description: Two X AoEs will appear in the middle, leaving a checkerboard-pattern of safe spots. Meanwhile, each player will get a large spread AoE. Players should spread out to assigned locations to avoid overlap.
The boss will also cast Dark Dome, so be prepared to move away to dodge the AoE bait when the cast bar fills.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Exchange of Agonies + Choros Ixou
description: Same as the first one.

timeline.name: Aetherial Exchange + Polyominoid Sigma #3
description: Similar to the first Aetherial Exchange + Polyominoid Sigma, but with the boss using Choros Ixou at the same time as the ground AoEs resolving.
If the tethered floor AoEs are short, the safe spots are the two tiles corner-adjacent to the X. If the tether is long, the safe spots are the two squares adjacent to the corner tethered +.
While there will be two safe spots, one will get cleaved by Choros Ixou. Wait to identify the first cleave before moving to the correct safe spot.

timeline.name: Chelic Synergy
description: Shared tank cleave that applies a bleed.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Cachexia #2
description: Tank LB3 this

timeline.name: Aetheric Polyominoid #3
description: Four X or + ground AoEs without tethers. Bait center then move to the safe spot.

timeline.name: Aetheric Polyominoid #4
description: Same floor pattern as the very first Aetheric Polyominoid. Avoid the Choros Ixou cleaves.

timeline.name: Synergy
description: Large AoE tankbuster on both tanks that also inflicts bleed.
Also inflicts a vulnerability debuff on the main tank, requiring a tank swap.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is a heavy raidwide.

timeline.name: Hemitheos's Dark IV
description: This is enrage.
